Question
========
Suppose you are interested in whether more hours of studying per week 
would lead to higher grades. You want to investigate this among students 
at the Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam. In this case, you want to select 
students from different programs, such as sociology, psychology, political 
science, and anthropology.

What is the measurement level of the variable "program"?

Answerlist
----------
* Nominal
* Ordinal
* Interval or Ratio
* Dichotomous

Solution
========

The correct answer is Nominal


Answerlist
----------
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
